27 #define TILEDARRAY_SPARSE_SHAPE_H__INCLUDED

29 #include <TiledArray/tensor.h>
30 #include <TiledArray/tensor/shift_wrapper.h>

36 namespace TiledArray {

39 
73 template <typename T>
74 class SparseShape {
75  public:
76  typedef SparseShape<T> SparseShape_;
77  typedef T value_type;
78  static_assert(TiledArray::detail::is_scalar_v<T>,
79  "SparseShape<T> only supports scalar numeric types for T");
80  typedef typename Tensor<value_type>::size_type size_type;
81 
82  private:
83  // T must be a numeric type
84  static_assert(std::is_floating_point<T>::value,
85  "SparseShape template type T must be a floating point type");
86 
87  // Internal typedefs
88  typedef detail::ValArray<value_type> vector_type;
89 
90  Tensor<value_type> tile_norms_;
91  mutable std::unique_ptr<Tensor<value_type>> tile_norms_unscaled_ =
92  nullptr;
93  std::shared_ptr<vector_type>
94  size_vectors_;
95  size_type zero_tile_count_;
97  static value_type threshold_;
98 
99  template <typename Op>
100  static vector_type recursive_outer_product(
101  const vector_type* const size_vectors, const unsigned int dim,
102  const Op& op) {
103  vector_type result;
104 
105  if (dim == 1u) {
106  // Construct a modified copy of size_vector[0]
107  result = op(*size_vectors);
108  } else {
109  // Compute split the range and compute the outer products
110  const unsigned int middle = (dim >> 1u) + (dim & 1u);
111  const vector_type left =
112  recursive_outer_product(size_vectors, middle, op);
113  const vector_type right =
114  recursive_outer_product(size_vectors + middle, dim - middle, op);
115 
116  // Compute the outer product of left and right
117 
118  result = vector_type(left.size() * right.size());
119  result.outer_fill(left, right,
120  [](const value_type left, const value_type right) {
121  return left * right;
122  });
123  }
124 
125  return result;
126  }
127 
128  enum class ScaleBy { Volume, InverseVolume };
129 
132 
143  template <ScaleBy ScaleBy_, bool Screen = true>
144  static size_type scale_tile_norms(
145  Tensor<T>& tile_norms,
146  const vector_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const size_vectors) {
147  const unsigned int dim = tile_norms.range().rank();
148  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
149  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
150  zero_tile_count = 0;
151 
152  if (dim == 1u) {
153  // This is the easy case where the data is a vector and can be
154  // normalized directly.
155  math::inplace_vector_op(
156  [threshold, &zero_tile_count](value_type& norm,
157  const value_type size) {
158  if (ScaleBy_ == ScaleBy::Volume)
159  norm *= size;
160  else
161  norm /= size;
162  if (Screen && norm < threshold) {
163  norm = value_type(0);
164  ++zero_tile_count;
165  }
166  },
167  size_vectors[0].size(), tile_norms.data(), size_vectors[0].data());
168  } else {
169  // Here the normalization constants are computed and multiplied by the
170  // norm data using a recursive, outer algorithm. This is done to
171  // minimize temporary memory requirements, memory bandwidth, and work.
172 
174  auto noop = [](const vector_type& size_vector) -> const vector_type& {
175  return size_vector;
176  };
178  auto inv_vec_op = [](const vector_type& size_vector) {
179  return vector_type(size_vector, [](const value_type size) {
180  return value_type(1) / size;
181  });
182  };
183 
184  // Compute the left and right outer products
185  const unsigned int middle = (dim >> 1u) + (dim & 1u);
186  const vector_type left =
187  ScaleBy_ == ScaleBy::Volume
188  ? recursive_outer_product(size_vectors, middle, noop)
189  : recursive_outer_product(size_vectors, middle, inv_vec_op);
190  const vector_type right =
191  ScaleBy_ == ScaleBy::Volume
192  ? recursive_outer_product(size_vectors + middle, dim - middle,
193  noop)
194  : recursive_outer_product(size_vectors + middle, dim - middle,
195  inv_vec_op);
196 
197  math::outer(
198  left.size(), right.size(), left.data(), right.data(),
199  tile_norms.data(),
200  [threshold, &zero_tile_count](value_type& norm, const value_type x,
201  const value_type y) {
202  norm *= x * y;
203  if (Screen && norm < threshold) {
204  norm = value_type(0);
205  ++zero_tile_count;
206  }
207  });
208  }
209 
210  return Screen ? zero_tile_count : 0;
211  }
212 
213  static std::shared_ptr<vector_type> initialize_size_vectors(
214  const TiledRange& trange) {
215  // Allocate memory for size vectors
216  const unsigned int dim = trange.tiles_range().rank();
217  std::shared_ptr<vector_type> size_vectors(
218  new vector_type[dim], std::default_delete<vector_type[]>());
219 
220  // Initialize the size vectors
221  for (unsigned int i = 0ul; i != dim; ++i) {
222  const size_type n = trange.data()[i].tiles_range().second -
223  trange.data()[i].tiles_range().first;
224 
225  size_vectors.get()[i] =
226  vector_type(n, &(*trange.data()[i].begin()),
227  [](const TiledRange1::range_type& tile) {
228  return value_type(tile.second - tile.first);
229  });
230  }
231 
232  return size_vectors;
233  }
234 
235  std::shared_ptr<vector_type> perm_size_vectors(
236  const Permutation& perm) const {
237  const unsigned int n = tile_norms_.range().rank();
238 
239  // Allocate memory for the contracted size vectors
240  std::shared_ptr<vector_type> result_size_vectors(
241  new vector_type[n], std::default_delete<vector_type[]>());
242 
243  // Initialize the size vectors
244  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < n; ++i) {
245  const unsigned int perm_i = perm[i];
246  result_size_vectors.get()[perm_i] = size_vectors_.get()[i];
247  }
248 
249  return result_size_vectors;
250  }
251 
252  decltype(zero_tile_count_) compute_zero_tile_count() {
253  decltype(zero_tile_count_) zero_tile_count = 0;
254  for (auto&& n : tile_norms_) {
255  if (n < threshold()) {
256  ++zero_tile_count;
257  }
258  }
259  return zero_tile_count;
260  }
261 
262  SparseShape(const Tensor<T>& tile_norms,
263  const std::shared_ptr<vector_type>& size_vectors,
264  const size_type zero_tile_count)
265  : tile_norms_(tile_norms),
266  size_vectors_(size_vectors),
267  zero_tile_count_(zero_tile_count) {}
268 
269  public:
271 
273  SparseShape() : tile_norms_(), size_vectors_(), zero_tile_count_(0ul) {}
274 
276 
283  SparseShape(const value_type& tile_norm, const TiledRange& trange)
284  : tile_norms_(trange.tiles_range(),
285  (tile_norm < threshold_ ? 0 : tile_norm)),
286  size_vectors_(initialize_size_vectors(trange)),
287  zero_tile_count_(tile_norm < threshold_ ? trange.tiles_range().area()
288  : 0ul) {}
289 
291 
298  SparseShape(const Tensor<value_type>& tile_norms, const TiledRange& trange,
299  bool do_not_scale = false)
300  : tile_norms_(tile_norms.clone()),
301  size_vectors_(initialize_size_vectors(trange)),
302  zero_tile_count_(0ul) {
303  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
304  TA_ASSERT(tile_norms_.range() == trange.tiles_range());
305 
306  if (!do_not_scale) {
307  zero_tile_count_ = scale_tile_norms<ScaleBy::InverseVolume>(
308  tile_norms_, size_vectors_.get());
309  } else {
310  zero_tile_count_ = compute_zero_tile_count();
311  }
312  }
313 
315 
324  template <typename SparseNormSequence,
325  typename = std::enable_if_t<
326  TiledArray::detail::has_member_function_begin_anyreturn<
327  std::decay_t<SparseNormSequence>>::value &&
328  TiledArray::detail::has_member_function_end_anyreturn<
329  std::decay_t<SparseNormSequence>>::value>>
330  SparseShape(const SparseNormSequence& tile_norms, const TiledRange& trange)
331  : tile_norms_(trange.tiles_range(), value_type(0)),
332  size_vectors_(initialize_size_vectors(trange)),
333  zero_tile_count_(trange.tiles_range().volume()) {
334  const auto dim = tile_norms_.range().rank();
335  for (const auto& pair_idx_norm : tile_norms) {
336  auto compute_tile_volume = [dim, this, pair_idx_norm]() -> uint64_t {
337  uint64_t tile_volume = 1;
338  for (size_t d = 0; d != dim; ++d)
339  tile_volume *= size_vectors_.get()[d].at(pair_idx_norm.first[d]);
340  return tile_volume;
341  };
342  auto norm_per_element = pair_idx_norm.second / compute_tile_volume();
343  if (norm_per_element >= threshold()) {
344  tile_norms_[pair_idx_norm.first] = norm_per_element;
345  --zero_tile_count_;
346  }
347  }
348  }
349 
351 
363  SparseShape(World& world, const Tensor<value_type>& tile_norms,
364  const TiledRange& trange, bool do_not_scale = false)
365  : tile_norms_(tile_norms.clone()),
366  size_vectors_(initialize_size_vectors(trange)),
367  zero_tile_count_(0ul) {
368  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
369  TA_ASSERT(tile_norms_.range() == trange.tiles_range());
370 
371  // reduce norm data from all processors
372  world.gop.max(tile_norms_.data(), tile_norms_.size());
373 
374  if (!do_not_scale) {
375  zero_tile_count_ = scale_tile_norms<ScaleBy::InverseVolume>(
376  tile_norms_, size_vectors_.get());
377  ;
378  } else {
379  zero_tile_count_ = compute_zero_tile_count();
380  }
381  }
382 
384 
398  template <typename SparseNormSequence>
399  SparseShape(World& world, const SparseNormSequence& tile_norms,
400  const TiledRange& trange)
401  : SparseShape(tile_norms, trange) {
402  world.gop.max(tile_norms_.data(), tile_norms_.size());
403  zero_tile_count_ = compute_zero_tile_count();
404  }

407 
410  SparseShape(const SparseShape<T>& other)
411  : tile_norms_(other.tile_norms_),
412  tile_norms_unscaled_(
413  other.tile_norms_unscaled_
414  ? std::make_unique<decltype(tile_norms_)>(
415  other.tile_norms_unscaled_.get()->clone())
416  : nullptr),
417  size_vectors_(other.size_vectors_),
418  zero_tile_count_(other.zero_tile_count_) {}
419 
421 
425  SparseShape<T>& operator=(const SparseShape<T>& other) {
426  tile_norms_ = other.tile_norms_;
427  tile_norms_unscaled_ = other.tile_norms_unscaled_
428  ? std::make_unique<decltype(tile_norms_)>(
429  other.tile_norms_unscaled_.get()->clone())
430  : nullptr;
431  size_vectors_ = other.size_vectors_;
432  zero_tile_count_ = other.zero_tile_count_;
433  return *this;
434  }
435 
437 
439  bool validate(const Range& range) const {
440  if (tile_norms_.empty()) return false;
441  return (range == tile_norms_.range());
442  }
443 
445 
448  template <typename Index>
449  bool is_zero(const Index& i) const {
450  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
451  return tile_norms_[i] < threshold_;
452  }
453 
455 
457  static constexpr bool is_dense() { return false; }
458 
460 
462  float sparsity() const {
463  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
464  return float(zero_tile_count_) / float(tile_norms_.size());
465  }
466 
468 
470  static value_type threshold() { return threshold_; }
471 
473 
475  static void threshold(const value_type thresh) { threshold_ = thresh; }
476 
478 
482  template <typename Index>
483  value_type operator[](const Index& index) const {
484  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
485  return tile_norms_[index];
486  }
487 
489 
497  template <typename Op>
498  SparseShape_ transform(Op&& op) const {
499  Tensor<T> new_norms = op(tile_norms_);
500  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
501  zero_tile_count = 0;
502 
503  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
504  auto apply_threshold = [threshold, &zero_tile_count](value_type& norm) {
505  TA_ASSERT(norm >= value_type(0));
506  if (norm < threshold) {
507  norm = value_type(0);
508  ++zero_tile_count;
509  }
510  };
511 
512  math::inplace_vector_op(apply_threshold, new_norms.range().volume(),
513  new_norms.data());
514 
515  return SparseShape_(std::move(new_norms), size_vectors_, zero_tile_count);
516  }
517 
519 
522  const Tensor<value_type>& data() const { return tile_norms_; }
523 
525 
528  const Tensor<value_type>& tile_norms() const {
529  if (tile_norms_unscaled_ == nullptr) {
530  tile_norms_unscaled_ =
531  std::make_unique<decltype(tile_norms_)>(tile_norms_.clone());
532  auto should_be_zero = scale_tile_norms<ScaleBy::Volume, false>(
533  *tile_norms_unscaled_, size_vectors_.get());
534  assert(should_be_zero == 0);
535  }
536  return *(tile_norms_unscaled_.get());
537  }
538 
540 
542  bool empty() const { return tile_norms_.empty(); }
543 
545 
548  SparseShape_ mask(const SparseShape_& mask_shape) const {
549  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
550  TA_ASSERT(!mask_shape.empty());
551  TA_ASSERT(tile_norms_.range() == mask_shape.tile_norms_.range());
552 
553  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
554  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
555  zero_tile_count = zero_tile_count_;
556  auto op = [threshold, &zero_tile_count](value_type left,
557  const value_type right) {
558  if (left >= threshold && right < threshold) {
559  left = value_type(0);
560  ++zero_tile_count;
561  }
562 
563  return left;
564  };
565 
566  Tensor<value_type> result_tile_norms =
567  tile_norms_.binary(mask_shape.tile_norms_, op);
568 
569  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, size_vectors_, zero_tile_count);
570  }
571 
573 
581  template <typename Index>
582  SparseShape update_block(const Index& lower_bound, const Index& upper_bound,
583  const SparseShape& other) const {
584  Tensor<value_type> result_tile_norms = tile_norms_.clone();
585 
586  auto result_tile_norms_blk =
587  result_tile_norms.block(lower_bound, upper_bound);
588  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
589  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
590  zero_tile_count = zero_tile_count_;
591  result_tile_norms_blk.inplace_binary(
592  other.tile_norms_,
593  [threshold, &zero_tile_count](value_type& l, const value_type r) {
594  // Update the zero tile count for the result
595  if ((l < threshold) && (r >= threshold))
596  ++zero_tile_count;
597  else if ((l >= threshold) && (r < threshold))
598  --zero_tile_count;
599 
600  // Update the tile norm value
601  l = r;
602  });
603 
604  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, size_vectors_, zero_tile_count);
605  }
606 
608 
611  inline bool operator==(const SparseShape<T>& other) const {
612  bool equal = this->zero_tile_count_ == other.zero_tile_count_;
613  if (equal) {
614  const unsigned int dim = tile_norms_.range().rank();
615  for (unsigned d = 0; d != dim && equal; ++d) {
616  equal =
617  equal && (size_vectors_.get()[d] == other.size_vectors_.get()[d]);
618  }
619  if (equal) {
620  equal = equal && (tile_norms_ == other.tile_norms_);
621  }
622  }
623  return equal;
624  }
625 
626  private:
628 
632  template <typename Index>
633  std::shared_ptr<vector_type> block_range(const Index& lower_bound,
634  const Index& upper_bound) const {
635  using std::size;
636  TA_ASSERT(size(lower_bound) == tile_norms_.range().rank());
637  TA_ASSERT(size(upper_bound) == tile_norms_.range().rank());
638 
639  // Get the number dimensions of the shape
640  const auto rank = size(lower_bound);
641  using std::data;
642  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = data(lower_bound);
643  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper = data(upper_bound);
644 
645  std::shared_ptr<vector_type> size_vectors(
646  new vector_type[rank], std::default_delete<vector_type[]>());
647 
648  for (auto i = 0ul; i < rank; ++i) {
649  // Get the new range size
650  const auto lower_i = lower[i];
651  const auto upper_i = upper[i];
652  const auto extent_i = upper_i - lower_i;
653 
654  // Check that the input indices are in range
655  TA_ASSERT(lower_i < upper_i);
656  TA_ASSERT(upper_i <= tile_norms_.range().upbound(i));
657 
658  // Construct the size vector for rank i
659  size_vectors.get()[i] =
660  vector_type(extent_i, size_vectors_.get()[i].data() + lower_i);
661  }
662 
663  return size_vectors;
664  }
665 
666  public:
668 
672  template <typename Index>
673  SparseShape block(const Index& lower_bound, const Index& upper_bound) const {
674  std::shared_ptr<vector_type> size_vectors =
675  block_range(lower_bound, upper_bound);
676 
677  // Copy the data from arg to result
678  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
679  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
680  zero_tile_count = 0;
681  auto copy_op = [threshold, &zero_tile_count](
682  value_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT result,
683  const value_type arg) {
684  result = arg;
685  if (arg < threshold) ++zero_tile_count;
686  };
687 
688  // Construct the result norms tensor
689  TensorConstView<value_type> block_view =
690  tile_norms_.block(lower_bound, upper_bound);
691  Tensor<value_type> result_norms((Range(block_view.range().extent())));
692  result_norms.inplace_binary(shift(block_view), copy_op);
693 
694  return SparseShape(result_norms, size_vectors, zero_tile_count);
695  }
696 
698 
704  template <typename Index, typename Factor>
705  SparseShape block(const Index& lower_bound, const Index& upper_bound,
706  const Factor factor) const {
707  const value_type abs_factor = to_abs_factor(factor);
708  std::shared_ptr<vector_type> size_vectors =
709  block_range(lower_bound, upper_bound);
710 
711  // Copy the data from arg to result
712  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
713  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
714  zero_tile_count = 0;
715  auto copy_op = [abs_factor, threshold, &zero_tile_count](
716  value_type& MADNESS_RESTRICT result,
717  const value_type arg) {
718  result = arg * abs_factor;
719  if (result < threshold) {
720  ++zero_tile_count;
721  result = value_type(0);
722  }
723  };
724 
725  // Construct the result norms tensor
726  TensorConstView<value_type> block_view =
727  tile_norms_.block(lower_bound, upper_bound);
728  Tensor<value_type> result_norms((Range(block_view.range().extent())));
729  result_norms.inplace_binary(shift(block_view), copy_op);
730 
731  return SparseShape(result_norms, size_vectors, zero_tile_count);
732  }
733 
735 
738  template <typename Index>
739  SparseShape block(const Index& lower_bound, const Index& upper_bound,
740  const Permutation& perm) const {
741  return block(lower_bound, upper_bound).perm(perm);
742  }
743 
745 
750  template <typename Index, typename Factor>
751  SparseShape block(const Index& lower_bound, const Index& upper_bound,
752  const Factor factor, const Permutation& perm) const {
753  return block(lower_bound, upper_bound, factor).perm(perm);
754  }
755 
757 
760  SparseShape_ perm(const Permutation& perm) const {
761  return SparseShape_(tile_norms_.permute(perm), perm_size_vectors(perm),
762  zero_tile_count_);
763  }
764 
766 
774  template <typename Factor>
775  SparseShape_ scale(const Factor factor) const {
776  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
777  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
778  const value_type abs_factor = to_abs_factor(factor);
779  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
780  zero_tile_count = 0;
781  auto op = [threshold, &zero_tile_count, abs_factor](value_type value) {
782  value *= abs_factor;
783  if (value < threshold) {
784  value = value_type(0);
785  ++zero_tile_count;
786  }
787  return value;
788  };
789 
790  Tensor<value_type> result_tile_norms = tile_norms_.unary(op);
791 
792  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, size_vectors_, zero_tile_count);
793  }
794 
796 
804  template <typename Factor>
805  SparseShape_ scale(const Factor factor, const Permutation& perm) const {
806  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
807  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
808  const value_type abs_factor = to_abs_factor(factor);
809  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
810  zero_tile_count = 0;
811  auto op = [threshold, &zero_tile_count, abs_factor](value_type value) {
812  value *= abs_factor;
813  if (value < threshold) {
814  value = value_type(0);
815  ++zero_tile_count;
816  }
817  return value;
818  };
819 
820  Tensor<value_type> result_tile_norms = tile_norms_.unary(op, perm);
821 
822  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, perm_size_vectors(perm),
823  zero_tile_count);
824  }
825 
827 
834  SparseShape_ add(const SparseShape_& other) const {
835  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
836  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
837  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
838  zero_tile_count = 0;
839  auto op = [threshold, &zero_tile_count](value_type left,
840  const value_type right) {
841  left += right;
842  if (left < threshold) {
843  left = value_type(0);
844  ++zero_tile_count;
845  }
846  return left;
847  };
848 
849  Tensor<value_type> result_tile_norms =
850  tile_norms_.binary(other.tile_norms_, op);
851 
852  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, size_vectors_, zero_tile_count);
853  }
854 
856 
863  SparseShape_ add(const SparseShape_& other, const Permutation& perm) const {
864  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
865  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
866  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
867  zero_tile_count = 0;
868  auto op = [threshold, &zero_tile_count](value_type left,
869  const value_type right) {
870  left += right;
871  if (left < threshold) {
872  left = value_type(0);
873  ++zero_tile_count;
874  }
875  return left;
876  };
877 
878  Tensor<value_type> result_tile_norms =
879  tile_norms_.binary(other.tile_norms_, op, perm);
880 
881  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, perm_size_vectors(perm),
882  zero_tile_count);
883  }
884 
886 
894  template <typename Factor>
895  SparseShape_ add(const SparseShape_& other, const Factor factor) const {
896  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
897  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
898  const value_type abs_factor = to_abs_factor(factor);
899  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
900  zero_tile_count = 0;
901  auto op = [threshold, &zero_tile_count, abs_factor](
902  value_type left, const value_type right) {
903  left += right;
904  left *= abs_factor;
905  if (left < threshold) {
906  left = value_type(0);
907  ++zero_tile_count;
908  }
909  return left;
910  };
911 
912  Tensor<value_type> result_tile_norms =
913  tile_norms_.binary(other.tile_norms_, op);
914 
915  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, size_vectors_, zero_tile_count);
916  }
917 
919 
928  template <typename Factor>
929  SparseShape_ add(const SparseShape_& other, const Factor factor,
930  const Permutation& perm) const {
931  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
932  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
933  const value_type abs_factor = to_abs_factor(factor);
934  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
935  zero_tile_count = 0;
936  auto op = [threshold, &zero_tile_count, abs_factor](
937  value_type left, const value_type right) {
938  left += right;
939  left *= abs_factor;
940  if (left < threshold) {
941  left = value_type(0);
942  ++zero_tile_count;
943  }
944  return left;
945  };
946 
947  Tensor<value_type> result_tile_norms =
948  tile_norms_.binary(other.tile_norms_, op, perm);
949 
950  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, perm_size_vectors(perm),
951  zero_tile_count);
952  }
953 
954  SparseShape_ add(value_type value) const {
955  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
956  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
957  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
958  zero_tile_count = 0;
959 
960  Tensor<T> result_tile_norms(tile_norms_.range());
961 
962  value = std::abs(value);
963  const unsigned int dim = tile_norms_.range().rank();
964  const vector_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const size_vectors =
965  size_vectors_.get();
966 
967  if (dim == 1u) {
968  auto add_const_op = [threshold, &zero_tile_count, value](
969  value_type norm, const value_type size) {
970  norm += value / std::sqrt(size);
971  if (norm < threshold) {
972  norm = 0;
973  ++zero_tile_count;
974  }
975  return norm;
976  };
977 
978  // This is the easy case where the data is a vector and can be
979  // normalized directly.
980  math::vector_op(add_const_op, size_vectors[0].size(),
981  result_tile_norms.data(), tile_norms_.data(),
982  size_vectors[0].data());
983 
984  } else {
985  // Here the normalization constants are computed and multiplied by the
986  // norm data using a recursive, outer algorithm. This is done to
987  // minimize temporary memory requirements, memory bandwidth, and work.
988 
989  auto inv_sqrt_vec_op = [](const vector_type size_vector) {
990  return vector_type(size_vector, [](const value_type size) {
991  return value_type(1) / std::sqrt(size);
992  });
993  };
994 
995  // Compute the left and right outer products
996  const unsigned int middle = (dim >> 1u) + (dim & 1u);
997  const vector_type left =
998  recursive_outer_product(size_vectors, middle, inv_sqrt_vec_op);
999  const vector_type right = recursive_outer_product(
1000  size_vectors + middle, dim - middle, inv_sqrt_vec_op);
1001 
1002  math::outer_fill(
1003  left.size(), right.size(), left.data(), right.data(),
1004  tile_norms_.data(), result_tile_norms.data(),
1005  [threshold, &zero_tile_count, value](
1006  value_type& norm, const value_type x, const value_type y) {
1007  norm += value * x * y;
1008  if (norm < threshold) {
1009  norm = value_type(0);
1010  ++zero_tile_count;
1011  }
1012  });
1013  }
1014 
1015  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, size_vectors_, zero_tile_count);
1016  }
1017 
1018  SparseShape_ add(const value_type value, const Permutation& perm) const {
1019  // TODO: Optimize this function so it does the permutation at the same
1020  // time as the addition.
1021  return add(value).perm(perm);
1022  }
1023 
1024  SparseShape_ subt(const SparseShape_& other) const { return add(other); }
1025 
1026  SparseShape_ subt(const SparseShape_& other, const Permutation& perm) const {
1027  return add(other, perm);
1028  }
1029 
1030  template <typename Factor>
1031  SparseShape_ subt(const SparseShape_& other, const Factor factor) const {
1032  return add(other, factor);
1033  }
1034 
1035  template <typename Factor>
1036  SparseShape_ subt(const SparseShape_& other, const Factor factor,
1037  const Permutation& perm) const {
1038  return add(other, factor, perm);
1039  }
1040 
1041  SparseShape_ subt(const value_type value) const { return add(value); }
1042 
1043  SparseShape_ subt(const value_type value, const Permutation& perm) const {
1044  return add(value, perm);
1045  }
1046 
1047  SparseShape_ mult(const SparseShape_& other) const {
1048  // TODO: Optimize this function so that the tensor arithmetic and
1049  // scale_tile_norms operations are performed in one step instead of two.
1050 
1051  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
1052  Tensor<T> result_tile_norms = tile_norms_.mult(other.tile_norms_);
1053  const size_type zero_tile_count = scale_tile_norms<ScaleBy::Volume>(
1054  result_tile_norms, size_vectors_.get());
1055 
1056  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, size_vectors_, zero_tile_count);
1057  }
1058 
1059  SparseShape_ mult(const SparseShape_& other, const Permutation& perm) const {
1060  // TODO: Optimize this function so that the tensor arithmetic and
1061  // scale_tile_norms operations are performed in one step instead of two.
1062 
1063  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
1064  Tensor<T> result_tile_norms = tile_norms_.mult(other.tile_norms_, perm);
1065  std::shared_ptr<vector_type> result_size_vector = perm_size_vectors(perm);
1066  const size_type zero_tile_count = scale_tile_norms<ScaleBy::Volume>(
1067  result_tile_norms, result_size_vector.get());
1068 
1069  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, result_size_vector, zero_tile_count);
1070  }
1071 
1075  template <typename Factor>
1076  SparseShape_ mult(const SparseShape_& other, const Factor factor) const {
1077  // TODO: Optimize this function so that the tensor arithmetic and
1078  // scale_tile_norms operations are performed in one step instead of two.
1079 
1080  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
1081  const value_type abs_factor = to_abs_factor(factor);
1082  Tensor<T> result_tile_norms =
1083  tile_norms_.mult(other.tile_norms_, abs_factor);
1084  const size_type zero_tile_count = scale_tile_norms<ScaleBy::Volume>(
1085  result_tile_norms, size_vectors_.get());
1086 
1087  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, size_vectors_, zero_tile_count);
1088  }
1089 
1093  template <typename Factor>
1094  SparseShape_ mult(const SparseShape_& other, const Factor factor,
1095  const Permutation& perm) const {
1096  // TODO: Optimize this function so that the tensor arithmetic and
1097  // scale_tile_norms operations are performed in one step instead of two.
1098 
1099  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
1100  const value_type abs_factor = to_abs_factor(factor);
1101  Tensor<T> result_tile_norms =
1102  tile_norms_.mult(other.tile_norms_, abs_factor, perm);
1103  std::shared_ptr<vector_type> result_size_vector = perm_size_vectors(perm);
1104  const size_type zero_tile_count = scale_tile_norms<ScaleBy::Volume>(
1105  result_tile_norms, result_size_vector.get());
1106 
1107  return SparseShape_(result_tile_norms, result_size_vector, zero_tile_count);
1108  }
1109 
1113  template <typename Factor>
1114  SparseShape_ gemm(const SparseShape_& other, const Factor factor,
1115  const math::GemmHelper& gemm_helper) const {
1116  TA_ASSERT(!tile_norms_.empty());
1117 
1118  const value_type abs_factor = to_abs_factor(factor);
1119  const value_type threshold = threshold_;
1120  madness::AtomicInt zero_tile_count;
1121  zero_tile_count = 0;
1122  integer M = 0, N = 0, K = 0;
1123  gemm_helper.compute_matrix_sizes(M, N, K, tile_norms_.range(),
1124  other.tile_norms_.range());
1125 
1126  // Allocate memory for the contracted size vectors
1127  std::shared_ptr<vector_type> result_size_vectors(
1128  new vector_type[gemm_helper.result_rank()],
1129  std::default_delete<vector_type[]>());
1130 
1131  // Initialize the result size vectors
1132  unsigned int x = 0ul;
1133  for (unsigned int i = gemm_helper.left_outer_begin();
1134  i < gemm_helper.left_outer_end(); ++i, ++x)
1135  result_size_vectors.get()[x] = size_vectors_.get()[i];
1136  for (unsigned int i = gemm_helper.right_outer_begin();
1137  i < gemm_helper.right_outer_end(); ++i, ++x)
1138  result_size_vectors.get()[x] = other.size_vectors_.get()[i];
1139 
1140  // Compute the number of inner ranks
1141  const unsigned int k_rank =
1142  gemm_helper.left_inner_end() - gemm_helper.left_inner_begin();
1143 
1144  // Construct the result norm tensor
1145  Tensor<value_type> result_norms(
1146  gemm_helper.make_result_range<typename Tensor<T>::range_type>(
1147  tile_norms_.range(), other.tile_norms_.range()),
1148  0);
1149 
1150  if (k_rank > 0u) {
1151  // Compute size vector
1152  const vector_type k_sizes = recursive_outer_product(
1153  size_vectors_.get() + gemm_helper.left_inner_begin(), k_rank,
1154  [](const vector_type& size_vector) -> const vector_type& {
1155  return size_vector;
1156  });
1157 
1158  // TODO: Make this faster. It can be done without using temporaries
1159  // for the arguments, but requires a custom matrix multiply.
1160 
1161  Tensor<value_type> left(tile_norms_.range());
1162  const size_type mk = M * K;
1163  auto left_op = [](const value_type left, const value_type right) {
1164  return left * right;
1165  };
1166  for (size_type i = 0ul; i < mk; i += K)
1167  math::vector_op(left_op, K, left.data() + i, tile_norms_.data() + i,
1168  k_sizes.data());
1169 
1170  Tensor<value_type> right(other.tile_norms_.range());
1171  for (integer i = 0ul, k = 0; k < K; i += N, ++k) {
1172  const value_type factor = k_sizes[k];
1173  auto right_op = [=](const value_type arg) { return arg * factor; };
1174  math::vector_op(right_op, N, right.data() + i,
1175  other.tile_norms_.data() + i);
1176  }
1177 
1178  result_norms = left.gemm(right, abs_factor, gemm_helper);
1179 
1180  // Hard zero tiles that are below the zero threshold.
1181  result_norms.inplace_unary(
1182  [threshold, &zero_tile_count](value_type& value) {
1183  if (value < threshold) {
1184  value = value_type(0);
1185  ++zero_tile_count;
1186  }
1187  });
1188 
1189  } else {
1190  // This is an outer product, so the inputs can be used directly
1191  math::outer_fill(M, N, tile_norms_.data(), other.tile_norms_.data(),
1192  result_norms.data(),
1193  [threshold, &zero_tile_count, abs_factor](
1194  const value_type left, const value_type right) {
1195  value_type norm = left * right * abs_factor;
1196  if (norm < threshold) {
1197  norm = value_type(0);
1198  ++zero_tile_count;
1199  }
1200  return norm;
1201  });
1202  }
1203 
1204  return SparseShape_(result_norms, result_size_vectors, zero_tile_count);
1205  }
1206 
1210  template <typename Factor>
1211  SparseShape_ gemm(const SparseShape_& other, const Factor factor,
1212  const math::GemmHelper& gemm_helper,
1213  const Permutation& perm) const {
1214  return gemm(other, factor, gemm_helper).perm(perm);
1215  }
1216 
1217  template <typename Archive,
1218  typename std::enable_if<madness::archive::is_input_archive<
1219  Archive>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1220  void serialize(const Archive& ar) {
1221  ar& tile_norms_;
1222  const unsigned int dim = tile_norms_.range().rank();
1223  // allocate size_vectors_
1224  size_vectors_ = std::move(std::shared_ptr<vector_type>(
1225  new vector_type[dim], std::default_delete<vector_type[]>()));
1226  for (unsigned d = 0; d != dim; ++d) ar& size_vectors_.get()[d];
1227  ar& zero_tile_count_;
1228  }
1229 
1230  template <typename Archive,
1231  typename std::enable_if<madness::archive::is_output_archive<
1232  Archive>::value>::type* = nullptr>
1233  void serialize(const Archive& ar) const {
1234  ar& tile_norms_;
1235  const unsigned int dim = tile_norms_.range().rank();
1236  for (unsigned d = 0; d != dim; ++d) ar& size_vectors_.get()[d];
1237  ar& zero_tile_count_;
1238  }
1239 
1240  private:
1241  template <typename Factor>
1242  static value_type to_abs_factor(const Factor factor) {
1243  using std::abs;
1244  const auto cast_abs_factor = static_cast<value_type>(abs(factor));
1245  TA_ASSERT(std::isfinite(cast_abs_factor));
1246  return cast_abs_factor;
1247  }
1248 
1249 }; // class SparseShape
1250 
1251 // Static member initialization
1252 template <typename T>
1253 typename SparseShape<T>::value_type SparseShape<T>::threshold_ =
1254  std::numeric_limits<T>::epsilon();
1255 
1257 
1262 template <typename T>
1263 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const SparseShape<T>& shape) {
1264  os << "SparseShape<" << typeid(T).name() << ">:" << std::endl
1265  << shape.data() << std::endl;
1266  return os;
1267 }
1268 
1270 
1275 template <typename T>
1276 bool is_replicated(World& world, const SparseShape<T>& shape) {
1277  const auto volume = shape.data().size();
1278  std::vector<T> data(shape.data().data(), shape.data().data() + volume);
1279  world.gop.max(data.data(), volume);
1280  for (size_t i = 0; i != data.size(); ++i) {
1281  if (data[i] != shape.data()[i]) return false;
1282  }
1283  return true;
1284 }
